textContent:
the drive to feed, water and energize the world IS the reason the world is at risk. the more we can feed, water and sustain our own life and be less dependent upon the world the more sustainable we can be. Existing exist in harmony with nature is the ultimate long term survival strategy. 

//

Is searching for meaning a search for survival? 
Is a search for pleasure the same?
Is a search for power the same still? 

If you are the universe then harmony with the universe is the ultimate reality 

//

Methane ha an 80x effect on climate
Methane will last in atmosphere 10-20 years

How much would stopping animal agriculture reverse the effects of all other carbon dioxide risks ?

Coal is used to make steel and cement. Steel and cement are what are used to make cities. Urbanization is a real problem driving demand for construction. 

De-urbanization with wood constructed or waste constructed housing may be a real solution
